attributes.action: Ban Korean cars from lane 3 on motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who choose to drive Korean cars obviously have little common sense or interest in driving so they shouldn't be trusted to use the 3rd lane of a motorway.  Currently they are able to create rolling road blocks at will and this is one of the prime causes of congestion on our mootorway network

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
